Mary-Ann

Thank you so much for translating that for us!

The Hokkaido Arc would have been so cool. After how Watsuki brought 
Saitou back to life in such an incredible way I would die to see how 
he'd give us Shinpachi. (he'd be no band-aid wearing moppet I'm sure).

-- 
Barbara Sheridan
